name: df-bj-arg
body: |- wceq(carg, cmpt(s0, cdif(cccbar, csn(nat0)), cif(cfv(cim, cfv(clog, cv(s0))), cfv(c1st, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc))))
comment: Define the argument of a nonzero extended complex number. By convention, it has values in ` ( -u _pi , _pi ] ` . Another convention chooses ` [ 0 , 2 _pi ) ` but the present one simplifies formulas giving the argument as an arctangent. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
